text: Sabah Abdul-Jalil (1 July 1951 – 28 February 2021) was an Iraqi coach and football midfielder. He last coached Al-Quwa Al-Jawiya. He made 37 appearances for the national team from 1975 until 1979, scoring six goals. Abdul-Jalil died on 28 February 2021 from COVID-19 in Baghdad, aged 69.وفاة النجم العراقي السابق صباح عبد الجليل متأثرا بكورونا ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraqi football managers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Iraq Category:2021 deaths
title: Sabah Abdul-Jalil
